DOC.brief_summary: According Canadian Cancer Society , 1 9 Canadian woman develop breast cancer lifetime 1 30 die . The single greatest risk factor breast cancer poor estrogen metabolism . EstroSense®/MD natural health product promote support healthy estrogen metabolism . It may increase ratio `` good estrogen '' `` bad estrogen '' potentially reduce risk breast cancer . For propose study , investigator examine effect EstroSense®/MD compare placebo , estrogen metabolism 120 woman .
DOC.brief_title: The Effects EstroSense®/MD v Placebo Improving Estrogen Profile Females
DOC.detailed_description: This randomise , double blind , placebo control , crossover trial evaluate effect daily consumption EstroSense®/MD estrogen profile female subject . 120 consent woman enrol ( randomise ) participate study . Potential subject recruit advertisement place notice board around university local naturopath clinic . Advertisements may also place local newspaper . The study consist four clinic visit . Individuals interested participate ask contact study coordinator schedule first clinic visit ( Visit 1 ) . At Visit 1 participant give information study give opportunity ask study . Those woman still interested participate ask sign consent form . Once consent obtain screen baseline data collection begin . If eligible , participant schedule return clinic 19-21 day begin last next menstruation Visit 2 . At Visit 2 baseline data collection continue follow random assignment intervention sequence . All participant give instructed consume 3 capsule per day EstroSense®/MD Placebo three menstrual cycle . After consume study intervention 3 cycle , participant ask return clinic ( 19-21 day start third menstruation ) Visit 3 . At Visit 3 data collect participant cross treatment three cycle . After 3 menstrual cycle ( 19-21 day start third menstruation ) participant return clinic Visit 4 final data collection . Visit 4 mark end study . Participants also provide diary throughout study record supplement use adverse event .
DOC.criteria: woman 2050 year age willing follow treatment protocol , study visit investigation require study . certain medication interfere study hormone replacement medication ( except birth control ) , anticoagulant , antiplatelet medication , digoxin , diuretic breast cancer medication , take natural health product alter estrogen level , indole3carbinol , flaxseed , borage primrose oil , smoke , pregnant nursing , cancer , fibrocystic breast disease , family history ovarian cancer , low estrogen symptom low estrogen , stomach ulcer excess stomach acid , know iron deficiency , gall stone bile duct obstruction , stomach ulcer excess stomach acid , history know liver disease , kidney disease , thyroid disorder , adrenal disease .
